name: George McGeehan Gamer Hero
description:
Reach level 99 in this casual, chill game.
No dieing, no guns and no checkpoints! :P

Beat the developer's best time (25mins) to
reach level 99 by jumping from platform to
platform while avoiding mildly annoying and
randomized enemies that make the player
fall to the bottom level!

Keyboard keys (PC Layout):
--A/Left to go Left
--D/Right to go Right
--J to Jump
--R to Restart
--M to change music
--Spacebar to skip
--ESC to Quit
